name: Speedy Drift-furious racing
description:
Tap to turn right, release to turn left and drift to the finish line! 

Pass the level, get reward of cars, merge your new car !

Unlock new road tracks, new appearances for a selection of vehicles that upgrade your power grows!

Car race:How many levels can you pass?Create the most impressive Drift Stunts ever seen. The more Thrilling stunt, the more money you will earn. 

Cross the road to drift it, show your skills to get to the goal.

Let's go for a drive!
